description:
Fauci has been a deep state player since the 1980s as a gatekeeper for Big Pharma, going as far as blocking promising research and treatments for Aids and other diseases while having the extreme power to approve or disapprove who receives ALL of the money for every bit of research on infectious diseases. He is a fraud. He has cost the lives of untold millions with the stoke of a pen or by a press conference. Or by throwing people like Dr. Judy Mikovits in jail and destroying her life and career. 

Watch Plandemicthemovie - it has 1 BILLION views. More than any documentary in history. 

Fauci is running this show - like he always has. He is a devil.
